Description: Pale-red pottery ostracon, from the body of a vessel, interior grooved and exterior with traces of a cream-coloured slip, with remains of six lines of black-painted demotic text on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (51720) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/51720)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
